name: Ceremonial Chief's Headwear
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ *** There are actually two types of them, made either from Small Obsidian Jar or Obsidian Jar. Jars drops of random mobs in Inner Sanctum. Only thing needed to complete the process is Advanced Hacker Tool, available from Devices Terminal. *** #L "Small Obsidian Jar" "206477" #L "Obsidian Jar" "206457" #L "Advanced Hacker Tool" "87814" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Ceremonial Watchman's Hood Small Obsidian Jar + Advanced Hacker Tool = #L "Ceremonial Watchman's Hood" "206459" Skills: | Requires 665 in Breaking & Entering Skill.| ------------------------------ Ceremonial Chief's Headwear Obsidian Jar + Advanced Hacker Tool = #L "Ceremonial Chief's Headwear" "206455" Skills: | Requires 855 in Breaking & Entering Skill. | ------------------------------ Note: Both headgears are leveling items (right-click on them to upgrade them), Watchman's between QL 140 and 180, Chief's between QL 180 and 200. Both are also title locked, Watchman's at title 4 to 5 and Chief's at title 5
